attributes.action: Increase the penalty for people who drive whilst under the influence of Alcohol or drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All too often, a driver will take the risk of driving having had too much to drink.
The current penalty obviousley does not have the power to deter anyone from driving whilst under the influence.
Those that get behind the wheel and take anothers life should be treated as murderers as they have knowingly driven whilst unfit.
Had the person who had taken anothers life randomly shot into a busy shopping center, they would be a murderer, why not a drunk driver.
We cal upon the government to increase the penalty of all drink drive related deaths to that of murder.
